alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 9:55PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oklahoma, northwestern Cleveland and northwestern McClain Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 955 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Oklahoma City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Oklahoma City, western Norman, Moore, Newcastle, The Fairgrounds and Will Rogers Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 112 and 121. Interstate 40 between mile markers 142 and 148. Interstate 44 between mile markers 105 and 122. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
